Reviews.Title: Fantastic package!
Reviews.Author: Barton OBrien
Reviews.Content: I was absolutely amazed when the package showed up and I discovered all of the goodies inside in addition to the camera.  Not only was there a 16GB memory card - as promised - but it was a 10 rated high speed card.  The tripod was fabulous - nice lightweight portable tripod - didn't even know they made this type for travel.Everything was top quality.  Great package!Highly, highly recommended doing business with these people.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: tantoria
Reviews.Content: This is a great bundle. Everything included was really great quality. I purchased this for our daughters 16 birthday and was very very pleased. Ordered on a wed and received it on that sat!

Reviews.Title: Nikon D5100 camera with 18-55mm lens
Reviews.Author: tristan
Reviews.Content: Received camera on date as promised. After extended research, decided to go with the Nikon D5100 with 18-55mm lens since this camera seemed to have all the features that I wanted in a SLR system. Shortly after receiving the camera, had some problems with pictures being out of focus and subsequently found that was mainly due to operator error. A technical representative at Cameta Camera was very helpful in the diagnostic of this issue.One thing I should mention that was not covered in any of the reviews I read, i.e. you need to use a HDMI cable (does not come with camera) when viewing pictures on a HD TV. The video cable that comes with it is a simple analog cable and you use loose a lot of picture clarity. Overall I think this is a great camera for a good price. Now looking to complement the dynamic range of this camera with a telephoto lens. You may also want to know that manual that comes with the camera is abreviated - the complete manual is on a disk in PDF file and is over 200 pages.Loaded the software that came with the camera on the computer but have not had time to gain a lot of experience with it. While I am not a profession with cameras, I have owned cameras all my adult life starting with an Argus C-4 in 1956. The Nikon D5100 has an extra-ordinary number of features available for the user. As of this writing, all my pictures have been taken in the "auto" mode. However, it is easy to see that with some experience this camera is capable of creating some fantistic pictures even under the most adverse circumstances. Got a long way to go!! Have not used the movie part of the camera as of this writing.

Reviews.Title: Amazing! Better than I could have imagined!
Reviews.Author: Moustachio303
Reviews.Content: I received my package 4 days before the delivery date. Everything was packaged really well. Everything was brand new and the boxes were in perfect condition. Everything included in the bundle was much better quality then I had expected for the price. The camera bag included is a real Nikon bag, that I have seen sold elsewhere for around $60. The tripod is very sturdy and works great with this camera. The SD card is exactly as promised. The camera came in perfect condition and works perfectly. I would recommend this seller and this order to everyone.***UPDATE****I had an issue with one of the small items in the bundle. I think it was just defective and was a manufacturing problem, not Cameta Camera's fault. Cameta Camera on top of selling a great bundle of products, also has great customer service. I sent back the defective item and within 1-1.5 weeks, I received a brand new replacement!

Reviews.Title: SO AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Brad Havelka
Reviews.Content: My wife has begun her photography career using this Camera! Great photos and great features! Awesome kit! Changed her life!

Reviews.Title: My first DSLR
Reviews.Author: Phoenix
Reviews.Content: It's been couple of years, I wanted to move out of my point-n-shoot camera to a DSLR. I had narrowed down my search to Canon T3i and Nikon D5100. After going through lot of reviews and videos on both, I decided to go for Nikon D5100. There isn't much of difference between the 2 products. But, the ones that made me go for Nikon D5100 is :1. AF Nikor lens. Nikor lens is the best in class as far as my knowledge goes. Again, I prefer a lens with AF motor and not a camera with AF motor.2. The camera size is appropriate for my hands. Its easy to hold and operate.3. It gives me the best natural shots (per my knowledge on light) even in low light situations. But, the LCD on canon is better compared to Nikon. So,in the begining you might not feel too good looking at your shots in LCD.4. Most of the functionalities on the camera are easy to access. You dont have to take your eyes off your object to actually make some of the small changes, like aperture.. iso..etc.. however, in canon its quite a task compared to nikon.5. The lens is very quite compared to canon when taking shots.6. I dont have much to write on this review as am no expert to talk more on the DSLR.. Am learning too. For anybody who's a beginner and looking to start off with a DSLR, NIKON D5100 would be the best choice. I love my Nikon D5100. It's been just 2months that I have had this camera and my experience with Nikon D5100 is getting better and better every time I use it. I have taken over 1000 shots. It just gets better and better with every shot.Will keep writing more.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my purchase! No regrets at all!
Reviews.Author: Sassy
Reviews.Content: Although I haven't had much time to play around with the camera yet, I am in love with it! I am new to the DSLR world and wanted a camera that would both have room for me to grow while not being miles above my ability. Additionally, the kit it came with is great! Having all of those items right away is a huge benefit. Everything was included and is brand new! It arrived on time as well.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: DianeB
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Nikon D5100.  I received it just a couple of days before I took a trip with a bus full of genealogists to Ellis Island, Ground Zero and passing the Statue of Liberty.  I didn't have much time to figure out how to use it but a woman in front of me had just received one for Christmas and the woman aside of me is a professional photographer.  Just on that one trip I took over 200 pictures that ALL came out excellent.Two days later I was on a plane to London for 8 days to visit my son & sister.  Everything was absolutely breathtaking as this was my first time.  My son was an excellent tour guide & on the first day he completely took over as the photographer for the whole trip.  He loved my new camera as well!  On this trip we took over 1,000 pictures. We were completely stunned that we had taken over 1,200 pictures total.Next will be a concert to see Alan Jackson & I can't wait to be able to zoom up soooo close as to get a picture of just his face.  Thank you Nikon for making this all possible.I purchased this camera thru Amazon at a lower price than I could find anywhere else.  They did not add all the extra's that came with my camers so this was a BONUS!  I'll anxiously wait for the day when this camera comes in a pocket-size version.  It was a little bulky carrying it around & I was so worried about banging it into something.A true fan of the Nikon D5100.

Reviews.Title: Camerafan
Reviews.Author: Doug Allen
Reviews.Content: Pashionate about digital photography, I recently upgraded from the Nikon D3000 to the D5100 and found this to be signficant imporvement.  Image quality with the D5100 is outstanding and I like the low light capabilites of the CMOS sensor.  While upgrading I needed a new memory card and cary bag.  This package provided these plus an UV filter, and tripod for no more than the bag and memory card would cost seperatley. I have a tripod so I really didn't need a new one.  It's not the strongest or steadiest, however, I really like it's compact size.  I think I'll find I use it more than my previous one due to it's protablity.  All in all, I'm very satisfied with this pruchase.

Reviews.Title: Best package from Amazon ever!
Reviews.Author: Chris360
Reviews.Content: This is my first time thinking about buying a DSLR camera,mainly for my upcoming college graduation this May. After doing extensive research online, I figured this Nikon D5100 package would fit my budget perfectly with literately everything I need around the camera. Although the shipping is a bit expensive, considering the FedEx tracking plus the fact that I don't have to pay any sales tax on Amazon, it is truly a unique buy and really saves me a lot of hassle. Everything included in this package works very well so far and I especially love the "Precision Design 57-In. Tripod" which makes it so easy for capturing still images. Thank you very much "Cameta Camera", you guys did a great job!

Reviews.Title: Camera is AWESOME, tripod is Ehh
Reviews.Author: BP
Reviews.Content: Camera is amazing, this thing shoots crisp clean pictures.The tripod included is a cheap, made of plastic, $15 tripod. It works, nothing special.Everything else in the kit works, for just a little more than the camera it's a great deal!

Reviews.Title: SO PLEASED!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rwolverton
Reviews.Content: Thank you Amazon.com for all of your services I think that this product is so great! I am so happy with my service by Amazon.com and all of the sellers so far. Please keep up the great work, and help the world grow. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kasey King
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera because we had read reviews that it would take excellent pictures quickly and it does. We have taken many pictures and recorded also. We looked at other cameras and we feel that we got the best camera for the money. All the additional accessories made this camera a great buy. The company was easy to work with. I actually called them because I wanted to make sure that the camera would arrive on time. The verifying the shipping date and it arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy, Great Price
Reviews.Author: this guy
Reviews.Content: Everything was as expected.  Tons of stuff included.  I got this for my wife and she is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: shauna
Reviews.Content: Perfect and user friendly!  Best way to go especially for the money...Get so much with this package you don't need to go and buy everything one by one!Plus its a much better buy, did a lot of research before I bought this and it was by far the best deal! Will need to by another lens for different zooms, but I knew I would have to at some point! Love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Best you can hope for in a consumer camera.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cardin
Reviews.Content: Now I'm no photography expert, but I have handled and used a couple thousand dollar cameras before, and this one in particular is very nice for what you pay for. Ill go ahead and say that its a very nice camera, as you can see I gave it 5 stars for my uses, so instead of saying everything that's great about it, ill just say the couple bad things that might matter to some people.The autofocus is not particularly quiet with the kit lens (which by the way is a really nice leans for the money and is probably worth getting unless you already have nikon lenses.) so if you're looking for using this with video (and want autofocus) then you will have to jump through one of a couple small hoops to have a workable setup.To shoot video you have to be in live view mode. Once you are in live view, you can't change the a number of the settings that you might want for finer video control. Again, it can be worked around with good cinematographic practices, but its something to note.So yea, if you're looking for a really video oriented camera at this price you might want to look into a canon. But for photography i would personally go with this camera, especially since nikon's lenses are very nice, and a bunch of the cheaper ones (pricewise)  just so happen to be really nice.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: no
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time.  It is awesome.  Everything was came as described.  I will be using this camera for a long time.  I really like it.  Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: good product - good transaction
Reviews.Author: Keith Osajima
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter.  The camera was delivered quickly and as advertised.  She loves it.  Has been impressed with the range of pictures she's now able to take

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: E. Hansen
Reviews.Content: Great camera, Easy to use and figure out. I can't wait to take more pictures with it and test out all the capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sohail
Reviews.Content: It is really worth to spend this much money for this fantastic product.  This is one of the excellent product of Nikon.  I would surely recommend this to everyone who is looking for to buy a great DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Excellent kit! Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Cynthia G
Reviews.Content: The package came just on time, the kit is awesome and in a very reasonable price, comes with a lot of things. The Nikon D5100 is a great camera. I'm very happy and would buy it over and over again.

Reviews.Title: Nikon d5100
Reviews.Author: Gus
Reviews.Content: Product was delivered in a timely fashion and definitely met the description provided. I'm looking forward to getting out and using this camera as much as possible.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Best Value
Reviews.Author: Singaram Sundar
Reviews.Content: Its the best SLR in line considering the value for money and its performance which is as good as its superior ones..The package was great and arrived was on time..

Reviews.Title: as promised....
Reviews.Author: Ahmad Khater
Reviews.Content: every thing was as promised, I even received the package 3 days earlier than expected. The components were really as promised. only the cleaning kit was a little bit of low quality

Reviews.Title: Camerta Camera needs to take care of their customers.
Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to receive my new camera and began to use it right away.  I use the camera for some work assignments out of town.  I was unable to access the pop up flash and was unable to contact Cameta Cameras until I returned from my trip.  It was 32 days after I received the camera.  They told me they did not have a replacement camera and I needed to contact Nikon to fix my problem.  They offered me an extended warranty but I was required to pay for the shipping costs to Nikon.  I was stuck will a defective camera and needed to go on another work trip where the camera was needed.  Not only was I dissatisfied by Cameta Cameras failure to provide me a functioning camera, they gave me misinformation concerning how to contact Nikon.  When I finally was able to contact Nikon, the support service representative suggested I change the battery provided by Camerta as the battery provided by them was not specified by Nikon.....I could not detect other operational concerns with the camera, but why wouldn't Camerta provide a Nikon specified battery?  Needless to say, I will not be buying other products from Camerta.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 9 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens + <2> Transcend 16GB SDHC 300x Card +
<3> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <4> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<5> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <6> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<7> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <8> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5100 16.2 MP Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens with 16GB Card + Case + Filter + Tripod + Cleaning & Accessory Kit
